synopsis.text:
Myuu, her mother, and a group of formidable companions join Nagumo Hajime on a perilous journey through the treacherous labyrinths of Tortus. Having emerged triumphant from previous trials, Nagumo seeks to conquer all challenges and find a way back to his original world. Meanwhile, his former classmates, who were once left behind, must confront their past failures and prepare for an imminent demon army invasion. As new and old enemies emerge, Nagumo must protect his loved ones and prove his strength against the most powerful foes.

Transported to a fantasy world, Nagumo was abandoned by his unreliable classmates, forcing him to survive on his own. Through determination and grit, he honed his magical abilities and found loyal allies. Now, he's on a mission to bring Myuu and her mother to Erisen, facing new challenges along the way. Despite the odds, Nagumo's resolve remains unwavering as he strives to return home.

Shizuku and her classmates, forever changed by their near-death experience and reunion with Nagumo, return to the royal capital. Meanwhile, Nagumo and his new ally, Kaori, venture into the unforgiving Gruen Desert, ready to face whatever trials await them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
